title: Augment Cache Chest
body: Hello, I wanted to buy these before but I haven't played league in a while and they aren't there anymore. Are they taken out permanently? When were they taken out?

replies.body: The augmented cache was only available through the [Project Disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) event a few weeks ago and are no longer available.  Any remainder materials you have can be disenchanted for a small amount of materials.  I hope that helps clear some things up, but me know if you have any questions!
